channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Two plastic barriers, 13th October
item.description:
There are two large council plastic barriers which have been left behind after use and need to be collected and removed. (they were originally protecting a hole that has since been filled in)
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Churchill Gardens Road, Pimlico, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street has NOT been cleaned, 13th October
item.description:
These photos are from this morning. Despite receiving notification that the street has been cleaned, it hasn’t. Please action ASAP & ensure there is regular maintenance of the street.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Mortimer Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead fox carcass, 13th October
item.description:
There is a dead fox on the sidewalk near a box. It has been ripped at the stomach already. Please remove

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Beckford Place, Walworth, London

item.title: Overhanging and large willow tree back of 26 - 26a Albany Close, 13th October
item.description:
The tree in the open space at the back of 26 - 26a Albany Close needs cutting back.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 28, Albany Close, Blendon, London

item.title: Graffiti on wall either side of businesses - 128 Peckham Hill Street, 13th October
item.description:
Please clear off the graffiti on either sides of the doorway, the other side between the dry cleaners, under the windows, all over the blue doorway and the windows itself have been tagged as well, please. basically this shop and really whole row of shops have been covered in graffiti recently and it all needs to be cleaned off. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 107, Peckham High Street, Peckham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead fox guts out close to primary school, 13th October
item.description:
Large dead fox on South Eden Park Rd beside only pavement accessing Unicorn School from south. Guts completely out, very traumatising for passing schoolchildren - clean up needs prioritised before end of school day TODAY please. Parents cannot avoid passing as there is no pavement on opposite side of road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Creswell Drive, Eden Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large hole on the canal bank, 13th October
item.description:
There is a large hole on the canal bank down the side of Garganey Walk between the foot bridge and the road bridge (Crossways) which someone could fall in, especially a child.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Garganey Walk, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken play equipment not repaired in TWO YEARS, 13th October
item.description:
Footscray Play Meadows Park - two pieces of equipment have been out of use for two years One a slide with a surface slit / deep scratch which could be repaired with coloured glass fibre One with hanging circular basket not replaced In a time when we are trying to motivate exercise, outdoor enjoyment and social interaction in children …Bexley Council should be more proactive PLEASE😇

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Riverside Road, Albany Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Illegal use of cones, 13th October
item.description:
The resident at 151 Dowsett Road n17 9dn keeps cones in there garden and everytime they leave there house in there car they put the cones in the road to save there parking space, which means other residents in the street have limited parking space
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dowsett Road, London
